fields.name: Stainless Steel Pipes & Tubes
fields.description: Various types of seamless, welded, ERW, and specialized stainless steel tubes.

fields.name: Stainless Steel Pipe Fittings
fields.description: Elbows, tees, reducers, nipples, and other stainless steel fittings.

fields.name: Stainless Steel Flanges
fields.description: Slip-on, weld neck, blind, and specialty flanges for stainless steel piping.

fields.name: Stainless Steel Sheets, Plates & Coils
fields.description: Sheets, plates, coils, chequered and perforated materials for fabrication.

fields.name: Stainless Steel Rods, Bars & Wires
fields.description: Round bars, hex bars, threaded rods, and stainless steel wires.

fields.name: Stainless Steel Fasteners
fields.description: Bolts, nuts, washers, screws, and anchor fasteners made from stainless steel.

fields.name: Stainless Steel Valves
fields.description: Ball valves, gate valves, globe valves, and check valves in stainless steel.

fields.name: Stainless Steel Clamps & Supports
fields.description: U-clamps, saddle clamps, hangers, brackets, and support systems.

fields.name: Stainless Steel Fabrication Components
fields.description: Manifolds, tanks, trays, enclosures, and custom stainless steel components.

fields.name: Specialty Products
fields.description: Sanitary fittings, hose couplings, ferrules, gaskets, and pharmaceutical components.
